committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to prohibit the making of loans or financial guarantees under the act to the Republic of South Africa.
subjects: Export-Import Bank of the United States

summary.text: Amends the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to prohibit any guarantee, insurance, or extension of credit by the Export-Import Bank to South Africa.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to prohibit the making of loans or financial guarantees under the act to the Republic of South Africa.
